bboxes.reason: Bounding box 13 includes the label 'MENU' on the button, which is the pressing area of the menu_button. This conforms to the soft pad selection criteria, where the label text constitutes the execution area.

The 'DELAY' button in the control panel is clearly visible and is circled by the bounding box with index 1. This bounding box captures the execution region of the soft pad, fulfilling the selection criteria.
The bounding box with index 2 sufficiently encompasses the label and pressing area of the soft pad representing the 'QUICK RICE' button, meeting the criteria for selection.
Bounding box 3 encompasses both the label and execution area of the soft pad labeled 'Keep Warm/Cancel,' making it a valid selection according to the criteria.
The bounding box with index 4 encompasses the 'START' button, including part of its label text and the interactive area. This aligns with the soft pad selection criteria for a button.

Bounding box 5 encompasses the entire digital display area, which is the appropriate control element in question. Other bounding boxes focus only on parts of the displayed numbers, not the overall display.
